job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWere working with a market leader in electronic health records EHR bases studies Partnered with world class biotechnology and pharmaceutical firms their platform runs real world evidence studies for regulatory and reimbursement purposesppbrppUtilizing data science and AI this company is looking for an NLP Engineer to take ownership of the NLP components working alongside the Product Manager to drive build and implement NLP models and infrastructureppbrppYou willpulliBuild refine and productionize NLP modelsliliVerify data quality supervise the data and find available datasetsliliTrain models and tuning their hyperparametersliliDefine preprocessing and validation strategiesliulpbrppYou havepulliBachelors or above in Mathematics Computer Science Engineering or other related fieldlili3 years of industry experience deploying NLP modelsliliExpertise with NLP techniques and librariesliliExpertise in visualizing and manipulating big unstructured datasetsliliExperience with cloudbased machine learning resources AWSliulpbrppbrppemBig Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hireemp
